instructions module

instructions.filter_instructions(content, hide_class, show_class, hide=False)[source]

Toggle sections in HTML content by replacing class names to hide or show content.

Parameters:

  • content (str) – The HTML content to modify.

  • hide_class (str) – The class name used to hide specific sections.

  • show_class (str) – The class name used to show specific sections.

  • hide (bool) – If True, hides the section by setting show_class to hide_class. If False, shows the section by setting hide_class to show_class.

Returns:

The modified HTML content with the specified sections hidden or shown.

Return type:

str

instructions.get_instructions(basename, hide_inst, hide_class='class="expert-section"', show_class='class="show-expert-section"')[source]

Retrieve the instructions and update based on the user’s mode (basic or expert).

This function reads an HTML file with the specified basename and modifies the content to either hide or show the specified section. The HTML file is expected to use class=”expert-section” for the expert section and have a style defined for that which hides the section.

In “expert” mode, this function replaces expert-section with show-expert-section. In “basic” mode, it replaces show-expert-section with expert-section.

Parameters:

  • basename (str) – The name of the topic whose instructions are to be retrieved.

  • hide_inst (bool) – True to hide the section, False to show the section.

  • hide_class (str) – The class to hide sections.

  • show_class (str) – The class to show sections.

Returns:

The instructions HTML content with the correct sections shown/hidden based on filter.

Return type:

str

Raises:

FileNotFoundError – If the HTML file for the topic does not exist.
